Now there is no sin in eating and drinking, but in the excess. The blessing of food has been turned to a curse by intemperate habits, and this we find in our own day. The same evils of intemperance engross the mind so that spiritual blessings are not discernible. We must put away every 


                                     -80- 

hindrance to our spiritual growth. When this is done, then the true light will shine.
